casebody.data:
ORBAN, et al.
v.
PIKE CORPORATION, et al. No. 32A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 29, 2016. Scott M. Tyler, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. Glenn E. Ketner, III, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, for Orban, Michael. J. Daniel Albert, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al. Paul R. Dickinson, Jr., for Lieberg, Collin. Marc Ackerman, for Lieberg, Collin. Richard A. Maniskas, for Lieberg, Collin. Kurt F. Hausier, for Beickert, Edwin. *170Brian D. Long, for Beickert, Edwin.

The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 28th of March 2016 by Defendant (Pike Corporation) to Withdraw and Dismiss Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of March 2016."
